subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Though I have sworn never to buy a ticket for the new Yankee Stadium, I feel the familiar ache of spring, for so many years synonymous with baseball season.
snippet: Though I have sworn never to buy a ticket for the new Yankee Stadium, I feel the familiar ache of spring, for so many years synonymous with baseball season.
